caption.center: MANUEL M. CABRAL, III, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: No. 94 MAP 2004, Appeal from the Order of the Commonwealth Court entered on 6/4/04, exited on 6/7/04 at No. 837 MD 2003 dismissing petition for review.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 28th day of September, 2005, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
